speaker: Chapel Ruin
lines: You step into a roofless chapel.
A cracked font holds rainwater and moths.
Bones are arranged in a rough cross near the altar.
A candle stub sits on the rail.
You strike a spark and light it.
The air tightens and then eases.
A shadow moves in the doorway.

choices.text: Hold the candle high and finish the prayer.
Snuff it and meet the shadow outside.
Leave a coin on the font and back away.
